64  template <class DynamicReconfigureType>
65  inline std::string ConfigManager<DynamicReconfigureType>::getManagerName()

75  template <class DynamicReconfigureType>
76  inline void ConfigManager<DynamicReconfigureType>::dynamicReconfigureCallback(DynamicReconfigureType& pConfig,
77  uint32_t pLevel)
78  {
79  // Prevent warning;
80  (void) pLevel;
81  if (!aIsInitializing)
82  {
83  // Save new config
84  aCurrentConfig = pConfig;
85  // Calls the manager so it update itself
86  onDynamicReconfigureChange(aCurrentConfig);
87  // Save the configuration to file.
88  writeConfigFile(aCurrentConfig);
89  }
90  else
91  {
92  pConfig = aCurrentConfig;
93  }
94  }
95 
99  template <class DynamicReconfigureType>
100  inline void ConfigManager<DynamicReconfigureType>::init()
101  {
102  aIsInitializing = true;
103  // Load the configuration from file.
104  readConfigFile(aCurrentConfig);
105 
106  // The original configuration as default.
107  aServer.setConfigDefault(aCurrentConfig);
108 
109  // Set the callback.
110  aServer.setCallback(boost::bind(&ConfigManager<DynamicReconfigureType>::dynamicReconfigureCallback, this, _1, _2));
111 
112  aIsInitializing = false;
113 
114  // This makes sure the node has the good configuration.
115  dynamicReconfigureCallback(aCurrentConfig, 0);
116  }
117  } // namespace utilities
118 } // namespace wm_admitance
119 
120 #endif //CONFIG_MANAGER_H
